props.appendIcon: Appends an icon to the component, passed to `Icon` component default slot.
props.autoGrow: Automatically grow the textarea depending on amount of text.
props.controlClass: Applies a custom class to control wrapper.
props.debounce: Sets delays to input value emit.
props.dependencies: Input controls contain element. Should not trigger focus on element click.
props.error: Puts the input in a manual error state.
props.errorCount: The total number of errors that should display at once.
props.errorMessages: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the **rules** prop. This field will not trigger validation.
props.hideDetails: Hides hint and validation errors. When set to auto messages will be rendered only if thereâ€™s a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display.
props.inputClass: Applies a custom class to input.
props.label: Sets input label.
props.lazy: Designates lazely emit of input value.
props.messagesOnFocused: Show validation message only when there is focused.
props.name: Sets input name attribute.
props.prependIcon: Prepends an icon to the component, passed to `Icon` component default slot.
props.required: Sets input required attribute. If not **required** and not has custom **stateErrorColor** used warning color in error state icon.
props.rowHeight: Height value for each row. Requires the use of the **auto-grow** prop.
props.rules: Accepts a mixed array of types `function`, `boolean` and `string`. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either `true` / `false` or a `string` containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) `false` or is a `string`.
props.stateErrorColor: Validation success state color class, `warn`, `none` or tailwindcss text class.
props.stateSuccessColor: Validation success state color class, tailwindcss text color class.

emits.update:modelValue: Emitted when the model value updated.
emits.change: Emitted when the input is changed by user interaction.
emits.blur: Emitted when the input is blurred.
emits.keydown: Emitted when any key is pressed.

slots.label: Replaces the default label.
slots.prepend: Adds an item inside the input and after input content.
slots.append: Adds an item outside the input and before input content.
